name: Unstoppable Mike: The Survival
description:
Unstoppable Mike: The Survival is a 2D Action Platformer Survival where the player oscillates left and right while dodging killer rotating blades. How long can you survive?

This game is made for Extra Credits Game Jam #3. As per the theme, the player cycles left and right, moving constantly.

Instructions:

UP ARROW key to Jump
LEFT KEY to slow when player is running right
RIGHT KEY to slow when player is running left
SHIFT KEY to Dash
DOWN KEY to slide

All keys are changeable in main menu.

Collect 500 points to activate shield.

Attributes:

Artist: Jonali Das
Developer: Sondeep Hazarika

Music: Rise of Spirit - Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov
SFX: Independent.nu https://opengameart.org/content/37-hitspunches

Game Engine: Construct 2

Discord: https://discord.gg/wsFhyRC
